revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SAPIDO |model=RB-1132 |revision=v2 |manuf=E-TOP |manuf_model= |availability= |type=wireless router,mobile hotspot |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EM2I-10G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware= |flags=3G capable,portable |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=SAPIDO_Mobile_Hotspot_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^SAPIDO_Mobile_Hotspot_[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:D0:41 |oui_eth=00:D0:41 }}The device has a AC connector and can also be powered from a Mini-USB jack.
[http://ftp.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Sapido_RB-1132 On the DD-WRT wiki] :[http://theigb.com/sapido/ High-res internal shots]
The default SSID appears to be '''SAPIDO_Mobile_Hotspot_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless LAN MAC address + 1.
